name: Nike Air Penny II Black Deadstock
description:
Nike Air Penny II Deadstock (worn once) size 12

The anticipation for the re-release of the Air Penny II has been great. Now, they’re finally here. Considered a classic, Anfernee “Penny” Hardaway’s second signature sneaker gathered mass attention when he wore them in the 1997 NBA All-Star Game. They feature an Orlando Magic color scheme, “Air” technology in the heel and forefoot, “Penny” logo on the side panel, and the always recognizable carbon fiber shank at midfoot for added arch support.
